caption.title: Targeted vaccination.
caption.p: Consequences of implementing a targeted vaccination program among 15-year-old-girls from 2021 onwards with various levels of effective vaccination coverage (from 20 to 80%) compared with no vaccination (thick black line). (A) relative risk of ZIKV infection during an outbreak in the 15â€“29 year age group compared with the general population and (B) attack rate of ZIKV among reintroductions resulting in outbreaks (median, interquartile range, with a threshold of 1%), when vaccination is introduced from 2021, 2031, 2041, 2051 or 2061 onwards (red vertical line).
